================================================================================ COMPLETE AGENT HIERARCHY - MERMAID DIAGRAM ================================================================================ Shows: 1. Main workflow (Chief Editor coordination) 2. Each agent's internal 10-step pipeline 3. Data flow between all components ================================================================================ ğŸŒ Copy the code below to https://mermaid.live ================================================================================ --- config: flowchart: curve: basis nodeSpacing: 50 rankSpacing: 80 --- graph TD %% Main Workflow START([Start]):::startEnd OUTLINE[Chief Editor: Create Outline]:::chief MERGE[Chief Editor: Merge Sections]:::chief EDIT[Chief Editor: Edit & Finalize]:::chief EXPORT[Chief Editor: Export Reports]:::chief END([End]):::startEnd START --> OUTLINE OUTLINE --> TRENDS_START OUTLINE --> STARTUPS_START OUTLINE --> SERVICES_START OUTLINE --> RESEARCH_START %% =================================================================== %% TRENDS LEAD AGENT - Internal Pipeline %% =================================================================== subgraph TRENDS["ğŸ“Š Trends Lead (Market & Player Trends)"] direction TB TRENDS_START[Receive Brief]:::agent TRENDS_FETCH[Fetch Data
SteamSpy, YouTube]:::process TRENDS_NORM[Normalize Data]:::process TRENDS_DEDUP[Deduplicate]:::process TRENDS_RANK[Score & Rank]:::process TRENDS_STORE[Store in SQLite]:::storage TRENDS_CLUSTER[Cluster Topics]:::llm TRENDS_ENRICH[Enrich Items]:::llm TRENDS_DRAFT[Generate Draft]:::llm TRENDS_VERIFY[Self-Verify]:::llm TRENDS_SAVE[Save Draft to DB]:::storage TRENDS_START --> TRENDS_FETCH TRENDS_FETCH --> TRENDS_NORM TRENDS_NORM --> TRENDS_DEDUP TRENDS_DEDUP --> TRENDS_RANK TRENDS_RANK --> TRENDS_STORE TRENDS_STORE --> TRENDS_CLUSTER TRENDS_CLUSTER --> TRENDS_ENRICH TRENDS_ENRICH --> TRENDS_DRAFT TRENDS_DRAFT --> TRENDS_VERIFY TRENDS_VERIFY --> TRENDS_SAVE end %% =================================================================== %% STARTUPS LEAD AGENT - Internal Pipeline %% =================================================================== subgraph STARTUPS["ğŸ’° Startups Lead (Funding & Ventures)"] direction TB STARTUPS_START[Receive Brief]:::agent STARTUPS_FETCH[Fetch Data
Product Hunt, NewsAPI]:::process STARTUPS_NORM[Normalize Data]:::process STARTUPS_DEDUP[Deduplicate]:::process STARTUPS_RANK[Score & Rank]:::process STARTUPS_STORE[Store in SQLite]:::storage STARTUPS_CLUSTER[Cluster Topics]:::llm STARTUPS_ENRICH[Enrich Items]:::llm STARTUPS_DRAFT[Generate Draft]:::llm STARTUPS_VERIFY[Self-Verify]:::llm STARTUPS_SAVE[Save Draft to DB]:::storage STARTUPS_START --> STARTUPS_FETCH STARTUPS_FETCH --> STARTUPS_NORM STARTUPS_NORM --> STARTUPS_DEDUP STARTUPS_DEDUP --> STARTUPS_RANK STARTUPS_RANK --> STARTUPS_STORE STARTUPS_STORE --> STARTUPS_CLUSTER STARTUPS_CLUSTER --> STARTUPS_ENRICH STARTUPS_ENRICH --> STARTUPS_DRAFT STARTUPS_DRAFT --> STARTUPS_VERIFY STARTUPS_VERIFY --> STARTUPS_SAVE end %% =================================================================== %% SERVICES/TOOLS LEAD AGENT - Internal Pipeline %% =================================================================== subgraph SERVICES["ğŸ”§ Services/Tools Lead (Engines & SDKs)"] direction TB SERVICES_START[Receive Brief]:::agent SERVICES_FETCH[Fetch Data
GitHub, npm]:::process SERVICES_NORM[Normalize Data]:::process SERVICES_DEDUP[Deduplicate]:::process SERVICES_RANK[Score & Rank]:::process SERVICES_STORE[Store in SQLite]:::storage SERVICES_CLUSTER[Cluster Topics]:::llm SERVICES_ENRICH[Enrich Items]:::llm SERVICES_DRAFT[Generate Draft]:::llm SERVICES_VERIFY[Self-Verify]:::llm SERVICES_SAVE[Save Draft to DB]:::storage SERVICES_START --> SERVICES_FETCH SERVICES_FETCH --> SERVICES_NORM SERVICES_NORM --> SERVICES_DEDUP SERVICES_DEDUP --> SERVICES_RANK SERVICES_RANK --> SERVICES_STORE SERVICES_STORE --> SERVICES_CLUSTER SERVICES_CLUSTER --> SERVICES_ENRICH SERVICES_ENRICH --> SERVICES_DRAFT SERVICES_DRAFT --> SERVICES_VERIFY SERVICES_VERIFY --> SERVICES_SAVE end %% =================================================================== %% RESEARCH LEAD AGENT - Internal Pipeline %% =================================================================== subgraph RESEARCH["ğŸ”¬ Research Lead (Academic Papers)"] direction TB RESEARCH_START[Receive Brief]:::agent RESEARCH_FETCH[Fetch Data
arXiv]:::process RESEARCH_NORM[Normalize Data]:::process RESEARCH_DEDUP[Deduplicate]:::process RESEARCH_RANK[Score & Rank]:::process RESEARCH_STORE[Store in SQLite]:::storage RESEARCH_CLUSTER[Cluster Topics]:::llm RESEARCH_ENRICH[Enrich Items]:::llm RESEARCH_DRAFT[Generate Draft]:::llm RESEARCH_VERIFY[Self-Verify]:::llm RESEARCH_SAVE[Save Draft to DB]:::storage RESEARCH_START --> RESEARCH_FETCH RESEARCH_FETCH --> RESEARCH_NORM RESEARCH_NORM --> RESEARCH_DEDUP RESEARCH_DEDUP --> RESEARCH_RANK RESEARCH_RANK --> RESEARCH_STORE RESEARCH_STORE --> RESEARCH_CLUSTER RESEARCH_CLUSTER --> RESEARCH_ENRICH RESEARCH_ENRICH --> RESEARCH_DRAFT RESEARCH_DRAFT --> RESEARCH_VERIFY RESEARCH_VERIFY --> RESEARCH_SAVE end %% Connect agent outputs back to main workflow TRENDS_SAVE --> MERGE STARTUPS_SAVE --> MERGE SERVICES_SAVE --> MERGE RESEARCH_SAVE --> MERGE MERGE --> EDIT EDIT --> EXPORT EXPORT --> END %% =================================================================== %% Styling %% =================================================================== classDef startEnd fill:#e1f5e1,stroke:#4caf50,stroke-width:3px,color:#000 classDef chief fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#ff9800,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 classDef agent fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#2196f3,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 classDef process fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#9c27b0,stroke-width:1px,color:#000 classDef llm fill:#fff9c4,stroke:#fbc02d,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 classDef storage fill:#e0f2f1,stroke:#009688,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 ================================================================================ ğŸ’¾ SAVE TO FILE: python visualize_full_hierarchy.py > full_diagram.mmd ğŸ“Š VIEW ONLINE: 1.
